iterations.description: This is a 2018 UI enhancement request to persist toolbar/menu bar position (e.g. bottom placement); the underlying WinForms ToolStripPanel docking persistence is non-trivial, upstream explicitly deferred it past v1.77 with no follow-up, and it has minimal engagement — not worth the implementation cost for our fork.

comments.snippet: Is there any possible timeline on this request?  It seems like a minor fix and would be hugely popular.
Would this be addressed in a future version? Please let me know.

comments.author: sparerd
comments.snippet: We can look into adding this, but it likely won't be in the next version (v1.77)
